metadata.title: CVE-2024-41072 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: cfg80211: wext: add extra SIOCSIWSCAN data checkIn 'cfg80211_wext_siwscan()', add extra check whether number ofchannels passed via 'ioctl(sock, SIOCSIWSCAN, ...)' doesn't exceedIW_MAX_FREQUENCIES and reject invalid request with -EINVAL otherwise.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
